Source: https://www.mining.com/web/south-african-iron-ore-mine-to-close-after-arcelormittal-halts-purchases/. The Beeshoek mine is currently placed on care and maintenance after ceasing operations due to the loss of its primary customer

web_search_companies.notes: Beeshoek is operated by Assmang, a joint venture between African Rainbow Minerals and Assore.
